SUSTAIN RESPONSIBLE OPERATIONS As part of the 2025 Sustainability 
and Social Impact Goals, Marriott 
aims to source a minimum of 
30% of its overall electricity from 
renewable energy by 2025 . In 2021, 
we enhanced our renewable energy 
tracking protocols and sourced 
0.30% of our electricity consumption 
from renewable energy. To increase 
renewable energy consumption, 
Marriott is undertaking an analysis 
of 1,300 properties in the U.S. The 
first round of this analysis revealed 
that over 800 properties had the 
potential for on-site solar installations. 
Marriott is also developing a possible 
low-cost capital solution to incentivize 
properties to install on-site solar. 
Over 5,500 EV chargers 
are installed at Marriott 
properties worldwide.
